alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Eastern Roosevelt; Sheridan (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:54PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Daniels, northeastern Roosevelt and western Sheridan Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 254 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Redstone, or 19 miles east of Scobey, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plentywood, Scobey, Flaxville, Archer, Port Of Whitetail, Port Of Raymond, Madoc, Port Of Scobey, Redstone, Whitetail, Outlook, Reserve, Raymond, Daleview, Navajo and Antelope. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Glasgow.
